item.title: About
item.description: About the Blog Owner haha, thatâ€™s me Hey, I’m Brandon! I go by DBSharpy on most places on the internet.1 I’m a Bajan-American game designer, writer and 3D artist from Brooklyn, NY. But…that’s mostly stuff from the portfolio bio. We can be a bit more informal here. As you could imagine, my interests span much further than the above creative outlets that I want to work in. A brief overview of my biggest hobbies:
